item.title: Trump defends key negotiator after leaked phone call appears to show him coaching Russia
item.description: A transcript of the call appears to show Steve Witkoff coaching his Russian counterpart on how they could get a better deal to end the war in Ukraine

item.title: How to watch the Macy's Thanksgiving Day Parade
item.description: The Macy's Thanksgiving Day Parade is back this year and promises to be bigger than ever. Here's a preview of what to expect and how to watch.
